resources.string: 1. To use the application, make sure that you have either internet or network connection.
2. When typing in one of the search-fields, if no suggestion is shown up then the book you are looking for is not in the database.
3. If you are not inside the library, you can use Global Positioning System to locate where the library is.
1. To use the Indoor Positioning System, make sure you have a solid internet connection and 3G/4G mobile network.
2. The application is portrait mode only and when you are using the Indoor Positioning System, make sure to hold your phone straight ahead in front of you and walk along:
3. Do not hold the phone in landscape mode or else the Indoor Positioning may not work.
4. When the Indoor Positioning System is started, the blue dot may take a small amount of time to converge to your actual position.

5. The Indoor Positioning System only works inside the library, and if you click on \"Indoor Map\" outside the library, the application will keep loading until you are inside the library. To go back to home screen,click anywhere outside the loading screen and use top left corner back button.
6. A pointer image which points to one of the bookshelves shows where your book is located.
